price: Luego, el Día de la Resurrección ante su Señor discutirán [intentando excusarse].
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyāmati ʿinda rabbikum takhtaṣimūna
